description: After a typical Yoshii mix-up, the class must work together to crack a safe holding the upcoming test. The exercise in teamwork will serve them well - three months have passed, so they`re due for another battle!

titles.title: Moshi to Kaitou to Love Letter
Teste Falso, Ladrão Fantasma E Carta De Amor!
Trial Exams, Mysterious Thieves, and Love Letters
模試と怪盗とラブレター
